headline.main: LATEST BY TELEGRAPH.; FROM WASHINGTON. The Cabinet and Lord Malmesbury's Dispatch --The Chinese Squadron --Bounty Laod--Mexican Affair, & c.

docs.lead_paragraph: I have the best authority for saying that there is not one word of truth in the report that the President and Secretary of State differ in their views of Lord MALMESBURY'S dispatch to Lord NAPIER. The President and the Cabinet are a unit on that subject, and they regard the question of the right of search or visitation as forever settled.

docs.lead_paragraph: The savannah papers announce the depth of the Hcd. RICHARD WAYNE, Mayor of the city. He was a native of Savanah. He was a son of RICHARD WAYNE, a highly esteemed merchant and citizen, and was born on the 25th of April, 1894; he was consequently a little over fifty four years of ave at the time of his death.

docs.snippet: NAVAL INTELLIGENCE.--The United States frig we Cumberland, which we announced at the Island of Madeira some time since, set sail for Santa Cruz, Teneriffe Islands, on the 8th of May, reaching that port on the 11th of the same month. The Cumberland...
docs.lead_paragraph: NAVAL INTELLIGENCE.--The United States frig we Cumberland, which we announced at the Island of Madeira some time since, set sail for Santa Cruz, Teneriffe Islands, on the 8th of May, reaching that port on the 11th of the same month. The Cumberland remained at Santa Cruz until the 15th of May, when she left for Port la Grande, in the Cape de Verde Islands, and reached there in safe y after seven days' sail.

docs.snippet: NEW SWEDENBORGIAN CHURCH IN THIRTY-FIFTH STREET.--The corner-stone of a new Swedenborgian Church, to be erected in gothic style, 75x50 feet on Thirty-fifth-street near Fourth-avenue, was laid yesterday morning at 8 o'clock with appropriate...
docs.lead_paragraph: NEW SWEDENBORGIAN CHURCH IN THIRTY-FIFTH STREET.--The corner-stone of a new Swedenborgian Church, to be erected in gothic style, 75x50 feet on Thirty-fifth-street near Fourth-avenue, was laid yesterday morning at 8 o'clock with appropriate ceremonies. The Rev. BENJ. BARRETT and the Rev. superintended the laying of the corner-stone,

docs.snippet: The Secrctary of the Navy, it is said, has decided to have the new vessels ordered by Congress built at Government Navy-Yards, and not by private contract. The eight propellers will be built respectively at the seven different Navy-Yards on the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Secrctary of the Navy, it is said, has decided to have the new vessels ordered by Congress built at Government Navy-Yards, and not by private contract. The eight propellers will be built respectively at the seven different Navy-Yards on the Atlantic coast, and the side-wheel steamer at one of the California ports.

headline.main: The Way our Beef is Brought to us.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Rochester Democrat mentions that on Friday and Saturday of last week, two hundred and seventy-nine cars loaded with fat cattle passed that city eastward on the New-York Central Railroad. The Democrat says: " All this makes lively business in that particular line, and few think of the amount of suffering which has to be endured by the poor brutes while on the route.

docs.snippet: Lee-Avenue Jubilee--5,000 People Out. All East Brooklyn turned out yesterday in its holiday dress to the greatest festival of the season--the "Jubilee of the Lee avenue Sabbath-School." For this grand occasion extraordinary preparations had been on...
docs.lead_paragraph: Lee-Avenue Jubilee--5,000 People Out. All East Brooklyn turned out yesterday in its holiday dress to the greatest festival of the season--the "Jubilee of the Lee avenue Sabbath-School." For this grand occasion extraordinary preparations had been on foot many days. The School, which with its weekly "boys meeting" is one of the best known and most wholesome institntlons that Long Island boasts, now numbers some 1,500 scholars, and about 100 teachers.

docs.snippet: The Cunard steamer Arabia reached Boston yesterday morning; her mails were received in this City last night. Ample details of news will be found in our columns. The declarations of Lord MALMESBURY, in regard to the late outrages, and the formal...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Cunard steamer Arabia reached Boston yesterday morning; her mails were received in this City last night. Ample details of news will be found in our columns. The declarations of Lord MALMESBURY, in regard to the late outrages, and the formal abandonment of the right of search, may be regarded as the leading topics, in connection with which must he taken the general scope of the debate in the House of Lords,

docs.snippet: Every one knows that small-pox can be prevented, by proper vaccination. The disease is clearly an unnecessary evil. yet it has been permitted to prevail in this City, for six months past, to a most disgraceful extent, and from Jan. 1 to the last week...
docs.lead_paragraph: Every one knows that small-pox can be prevented, by proper vaccination. The disease is clearly an unnecessary evil. yet it has been permitted to prevail in this City, for six months past, to a most disgraceful extent, and from Jan. 1 to the last week in June, 425 persons have died from it. Physicians say that under unfavorable circumstances,
